website_summaries.verdict: Little Tikes outdid themselves with this innovative playhouse and construction toy, and it’ll keep kids entertained as they renovate this tiny home.
pros: Includes 25 colorful wall panels and kid-friendly screwdriver-power drill combo
cons: Not as sturdy as traditional Little Tikes playhouses

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good concept but is extremely flimsy and not that stable once built.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Paez

customer_reviews.title: 2, 5 and 8 year old love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our kids for Christmas and they have been in love with it. They enjoyed helping set it up initially and all of the tear down and rebuilds since. The structure is built very well and in a way so that kids cannot completely disassemble the entire structure. I was impressed that the screws stay in the plastic so they do not get lost, and it came with extras. One problem we did was was the drill arrived broken, but a quick email into Little Tykes and they shipped us a replacement at no cost and included an extra screw driver (no more fighting kids!).
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: I'm surprised little times puts their name on it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't quite meet little tikes normal standards in my opinion. Im suprised they haven't recalled it and just stuck it in a safe. Like it never was here. Lol that being said poor quality it breaks with just the building of the structure it's not very easy for the kids are group at all. Ok with help it's capable. It is a cheap house so that's a plus but its more like just the shell with a floppy roof.
customer_reviews.author: The Jackson family

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Santa left this for our twin boys. It now is a permanent fixture in our living room. I wouldn’t necessarily recommend this for outside use. Our boys have played with it for hours everyday since Christmas!! I’ve even joined in on play time. I love and appreciate that the plastic screws are able to be attached permanently to each piece. Just overall a great addition to playtime learning!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful playhouse kids can build over and over again!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our now 7-year-old boy for Christmas when he was just 5 years old. His dad put it together in his playroom in a couple of hours. Our son still enjoys using the included power tools to re-build the house in different ways with the customizable panels, rearranging the windows, mailbox and door in different places. We put some furniture in there, Disney Lightning McQueen upholstered chair with matching foot rest and he just enjoys sitting in his spacious beautiful house playing his IPad. When his friends come over, they are able to play together inside the house, playing cops and robbers!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids!  Easy panel install/removal
customer_reviews.text: This play building is awesome. Got it for my daughter and she loves being able to configure the panels. She makes places she can crawl through for her only and loves placing the windows and doors. She figured out how to install and remove the panels in minutes. Took about 2 hours to put together just myself taking my time. If I left the panels for my daughter to put up may have only been 1.5 hours to build. Keeps her busy for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this house! It did not take long to put it together to make the frame of the house that requires adults to put it together before the kids can play with it. All of the pieces were included and none were missing. Extra pieces are given in the box. My only complaint is that the box arrived from Amazon very beat up but that would be Amazon's fault and not the fault of Little Tikes who makes the product. Amazon is terrible for delivering boxes that are very damaged!
customer_reviews.author: NaplesFL_Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Adorable house
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids for Christmas and it was great! You have to set up the frame first, which is like maybe 12pieces that get screwed together? Than hand off the drill/screwdriver and let your kiddos do the rest! My sons took that thing apart and rebuilt it probably27x in the first day alone. Now that it's in our backyard their friends come over and play " McDonald's " , " mr.mailman", and a few other games. Id definitely recommend buying one!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlan

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids that like building things, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the interactive aspect of this and my 2 boys (6 & 3) are having a great time playing with it. The quality of the panels is not great and several are warped/don't fit into place easily. I wish they were a bit thicker so they would be more sturdy - especially roof, door, windows. We are using indoors but I don't think it would hold up well outside.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cho

customer_reviews.title: Blows apart in the wind
customer_reviews.text: Pieces blow off in the wind! From California where it is not usually windy, but if there are gusts over 15mph the little house panels blow off in the wind, making it nearly impossible to find the screws to piece it back together. Recommend to use inside or enclosed patio or deck. Fun idea when it is not windy, my daughter loves to “build” her house.
customer_reviews.author: i-like-owls

customer_reviews.title: Twins approved
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 year old twins and they love it. Took mommy and daddy a good hour to put it all together before they were able to build. When it is finished the screws do come loose that the kids screw. Doesnt bug us much since they are always moving pieces around.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in a concealed box. Some of the pieces have white spots on the blue. One piece was broken. The house itself was easy to build. The siding and toy screws are very hard to put in. My 4 yr olds can not do it,hubby had a hard time with the play screw driver. The drill does not work well, breaks often. Cute house but not as expected. Disappointed for the price. I will be contacting the manufacturer for replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Much fun
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely fantastic! Very sturdy! Took a little time to assemble so the kiddos were being impatient of course. After my part in the assembly, they had a blast changing it and playing house
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Bozarth

customer_reviews.title: Assembly not that easy but good little house
customer_reviews.text: Nice little house. Our granddaughter loves it. Took grandpa longer than expected to put together. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Kids can't build it
customer_reviews.text: The house, itself, is fine, but the panels are too finicky and difficult to position properly. My 6 year old was unable to perform any of the assembly on his own which is kind of the point. Should have called it "House", not "Build-a-house".
customer_reviews.author: Arsenal Gunner

customer_reviews.title: Dont get me started
customer_reviews.text: #1This thing was a b**** to put together! Like way the heck was this so difficult to put together. #2 when looking at this product It stated that it could be an out door toy. If you live in Texas dont, it was be torn apart.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great product - missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product - the kids are having a blast. Four stars because the half the screws were missing. The box was sealed, so they weren't in there from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne

customer_reviews.title: Package
customer_reviews.text: The toy is very nice the problem was Amazon delivered on original package, keep in mind is Chritmas so my son saw it and ruined the surprise
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Both my 4 year old and 2 year old love this play house. The 4 year old keeps busy taking off the panels and then "building" the house again. This is good quality, sturdy, and seems like it will last for a few years. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Starlyte828

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, long setup
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy! Really fun concept but the initial set up does take a long time. Definitely worth it if your ok spending a few hours getting it ready.
customer_reviews.author: Kjersten

customer_reviews.title: Problem
customer_reviews.text: I put 2 stars because it was hard trying to put the plastic screws in. The battery powered screwdriver would brake the screw if you pressed too hard. Definitely not something a child could build on their own. An adult has to build it
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Great grandchildren and grandchildren love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great-Granddaughters loved it! They weee so happy to be able to use their own tools!! It’s a little hard to take apart!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality, but neat concept
customer_reviews.text: It was extremely flimsy and didn’t last a week because it rained outside. It was easy to build, and my daughter thought it was cool, but on the fourth day that we had it, it rained overnight and when we came out the next day, the house was broken and completely twisted. Although the concept of this house is neat, I would suggest spending the money on something that holds up better for outside!
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart so easily.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a playhouse that will leave you wondering where all the pieces went after the kids played with it or a wind storm came through, this is the playhouse for you! The kids “screws” fall out all of the time. Leaving the framed house open and easily destroyed by kids or storms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unscrewed
customer_reviews.text: The plastic screws don't stay put. They come unscrewed easily. I find pieces of the house coming off just from every day play.
customer_reviews.author: Petrina

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it and they had a blast building it.the really enjoy re arranging the panels and making it look different. This was a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money you pay
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I would hit on is that some of the panels are a little bent out of shape but still playable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item looked like a return and was in a shabby state.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today and the box was torn and retapped and the pieces to the house were thrown in the box. Obviously this must have been a return. This was suppose to be a birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Bonoffski

customer_reviews.title: X-mas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift christmas gift. I haven't actually put it to getter yet but i am amazed that this was even a choice I am sure the little boy this is for will really enjoy it for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: When my twin 3 year old boy and girl first saw it and screamed out “we need our tools” I knew this was a winner. They had a blast helping me set it up and use it as their daily hangout in playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Karl G

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how much work it would be putting it together but afterwards I was completely in love. My child loves undoing the tiles and putting them back, and I love her having her own little play house.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely flimsy, no floor difficult to build, difficult for the child to build their parts. Returned
customer_reviews.author: redhead_chameleon

customer_reviews.title: Parents approved 👍 kids 🥰
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it so much and they play like they are a little engineers 🥰
customer_reviews.author: K & A

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty flimsy and cheap feeling. My 4yr old likes to take things apart so it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: azpictaker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old daughter is obsessed with building and loves this house! It’s not quite as sturdy as I expected but it’s very easy to use...my daughter figured it out in just a few minutes. I am going to buy an additional set of tools since the 2 it comes with is not enough if you have a group of kids playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Maloy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and my grandson really likes it. So do I!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool house
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have any issues like I saw in a few of the bad reviews. My daughter is 38lbs and often sits on top of her house to watch the tv, so it’s pretty sturdy. She takes all of her dolls inside so it’s sort of a storage space too. Two thumbs up...
customer_reviews.author: Corey Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just for kids 👍
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it play with the little tools that went with it So cute
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle moktader

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this would be too young for my 5 year old daughter, but since she can use the included power screw driver to change up the house, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rubert

customer_reviews.title: Great project
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved helping me build it then they could easily remove and replace panels as they wanted
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughters love it,they actually put most of it together ughem selves
customer_reviews.author: Jade Wadleigh

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness! Will keep your kids entertained
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ! My kids loved it. I do wish it came with extra screws! The screws on these are plastic and easy to lose!
customer_reviews.author: Demesio

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Two of the panels were warped in packaging. Hoping that a little sun will clean that up. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Just being honest.
customer_reviews.text: Drill does not even work. Very time consuming and difficult to insert screws therefore I am unsure how a kiddo is expected to do it.
customer_reviews.author: L dub

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very fun project for our family however it was not something my daughter could easily do by herself. It also falls apart often (1 to 2 peices a week).
customer_reviews.author: Tiarra keough

customer_reviews.title: I have not received credit, its way past the time
customer_reviews.text: Made very badly Missing pieces asked to be credited and I still have not seen my credit
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Turano

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: VERY many pieces! Took about 2hrs to assemble. But TOTALLY worth it! My 4 & 6 yr old play with it ALL day everyday!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy G.

customer_reviews.title: Playhouse
customer_reviews.text: Wish it could of had more to it, for the price it should had musice or a door bell
customer_reviews.author: Scotty lamoun

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them busy for hours
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old hasn’t stopped taking it apart and building it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this, so for me it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Moore

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that it didn’t come with enough panels to enclose the entire house.
customer_reviews.author: DANA SPIRES

customer_reviews.title: trash no good
customer_reviews.text: this us an awful toy ny grandsons are 3 and 4. it falls apart constantly tarable
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with complete parts
customer_reviews.text: Came with too many of one type of part, and not enough of another type of part.
customer_reviews.author: Liron Lepine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it (he is 3) and my daughter (9 months) has a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in all shape and form, very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: SAIGA O

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Item was missing one piece. E2 which is part of the frame of the roof. 😫
customer_reviews.author: P Money

customer_reviews.title: Feels unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this house. Seemed like a lot of fun. We have ton of toys and we have assembled many items over the years . Sadly, this product is so poorly designed and worse even feels extremely unsafe for kids as there are many sharp gaps between “customizable” panels where little fingers could get trapped and hurt.
customer_reviews.author: d.d.

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Build-a-House
product_meta.description:
Build it your way! Create your very own playhouse with Little Tikes Build-a-House! Kids can customize the look of the house with interchangeable panels and easy-to-use tools. Great for the backyard, basement or any playroom. They can build it, take it apart, and rebuild it to create endless variations! 

Little Tikes playhouses are designed with an unbelievable number of features. Kids will play for hours and families will enjoy these clubhouses for years. A Little Tikes playhouse means quality! Playhouses promote physical and social play. Looking for a great addition to your swing set or sandbox? This is it!Maintenance - Check all hardware twice monthly during the usage period and tighten as required. It is particularly important that this procedure be followed at the beginning of each season. If these checks are not carried out, the toy could overturn or otherwise become a hazard. Replace if they are loose, cracked, or missing. Take this product indoors or do not use outdoors when temperatures fall below 0°F (-18°C) Made in USA
feature_bullets: Parents build the frame and roof, then kids customize the rest
Includes 25+ customizable panels and accessories, a kid-friendly drill and screwdriver
Great for indoor or outdoor play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars210 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
